name: Implement Swipable Goal Cards in Focus Tab
description: Develop the Focus tab feature with interactive goal cards, swipe functionality, and Time Timer-style countdown

subtasks.name: Add Subgoal Management
subtasks.description: Implement add/delete functionality for individual subgoals

subtasks.name: Implement In-Card Editing
subtasks.description: Implement editing functionality directly on the card when tapped, allowing users to edit card title and subgoals inline without opening a separate modal

subtasks.name: Add Input Validation
subtasks.description: Add validation for empty or duplicate subgoals

subtasks.name: Add Edit Persistence
subtasks.description: Implement local storage to persist card edits between sessions

subtasks.name: Task Completion Sound Effects
subtasks.description:
Add sound effects when completing tasks, including:
- Success sound when marking a task as complete
- Different sound when unchecking a task
- Volume control for sound effects
- Option to disable sounds in settings
subtasks.notes: Removed due to technical issues and complexity. Core functionality works without audio effects.

subtasks.name: Visual Left/Right Piles
subtasks.description: Implement the visual representation of card piles on left and right sides

subtasks.name: Create Pile Icons
subtasks.description: Design and implement small card icons for left/right piles
subtasks.notes: Implemented using MaterialIcons 'layers' with green color for left pile and blue for right pile

subtasks.name: Implement Pile Counter
subtasks.description: Add visual counter showing number of cards in each pile
subtasks.notes: Real-time counters showing number of cards in each pile with animated updates

subtasks.name: Add Pile Animations
subtasks.description: Implement smooth animations when cards move to piles
subtasks.notes: Smooth scale animations using react-native-reanimated when cards are added to piles
Successfully implemented visual piles with icons, counters, and animations. Added fallback handling to prevent deletion/swiping of last card and empty state management.

subtasks.name: Time Timer Implementation
subtasks.description: Create the circular countdown timer component with Time Timer/Duolingo style

subtasks.name: Create Circular Timer UI
subtasks.description: Implement the Time Timer-style circular countdown using react-native-svg
subtasks.notes: Enhanced circular timer with dynamic colors (green/orange/red based on progress), center dot, and improved visual design

subtasks.name: Add Timer Animation
subtasks.description: Create smooth animation for the countdown arc that shrinks as time passes
subtasks.notes: Implemented smooth progress animations, pulse effects when running, and completion animations with scale effects

subtasks.name: Implement Timer Controls
subtasks.description: Add intuitive controls for starting, pausing, and resetting the timer
subtasks.notes: Added pause/resume and reset controls with tap-to-show interface. Enhanced SetTimer with quick presets (25, 45, 60 min) and better UX
Successfully implemented sophisticated Time Timer with dynamic colors, smooth animations, intuitive controls, and enhanced timer selection interface with quick presets.
